XII.i.3.B.2
.
a
.
Action to Take Upon the Death of a Surviving Spouse
Upon the death of a surviving spouse, terminate the surviving spouse’s award, effective the first day of the month of death.
Note
:  The provisions of
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 2.E.4
relating to action to take after the remarriage of a surviving spouse also apply when establishing the entitlement of children after the spouse’s death.
Reference
:  For more information on end product credit, see
M21-4, Appendix B
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section B - Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) Awards Following Death of a Surviving Spouse or Dependent
